text: The American People desperately need us to undo the continuing destruction and willful neglect of Bidenomics. With regard to the Speaker? Talk to me in 45 days. We need to finish the mission and secure some wins for the American People ‚Äì they are my only priority. #MotionToVacate
If our Troops and public servants have to forego pay because Congress cant pass a budget, I shouldn‚Äôt get paid either.  Here‚Äôs my letter requesting that.

We‚Äôve  used the Gregorian calendar for 441 years.  Mr. Speaker, you‚Äôve known that September 30th was coming, which is why we urged you to put a plan in place SINCE JANUARY.  You wasted valuable time adjourning in August, to this day, you offer NO PLAN. Unacceptable.
My condolences to the family, friends, and colleagues of Sen. Feinstein ‚Äî may she rest in peace.
We cannot and should not leave DC until the job is done.
Mr. Speaker, leaders lead from the FRONT.  We need your plan.

ABC/WAPO Poll finds only 23% of Americans approve of President Biden‚Äôs handling of the border, and roughly 3 in 4 Americans say the economy is not so good or poor, with only 15% saying they‚Äôre better off under Biden. We MUST secure our border and stop spending into oblivion!
President Biden just presided over highest illegal crossing attempts ever recorded in a month ‚Äî 304,162. This abomination must end.  #NoSecurityNoFunding

While relieved 5 Americans held hostage by the terrorist-supporting regime in Iran are reunited with families, it‚Äôs outrageous the Biden Administration is incentivizing hostage taking by sending $6 billion of fungible money likely to find its way toward killing more Americans.

For the first time this Congress,

HFC Members have worked over the weekend with the Main Street Caucus on a path forward to fund the government and secure America‚Äôs border. We now have a framework for our colleagues across the House Republican Conference.
Thank you to the great Lou Dobbs for the opportunity to talk about the impeachment inquiry and what‚Äôs at stake for Americans
Tune in, I‚Äôve got some questions‚Ä¶

Inflationary pressures are making life miserable for Americans, and Washington‚Äôs spending addiction makes worse. The status quo must go, and it goes when we simply do what we said we were going to do if you sent us here to represent you.

The American People are tired of the Washington theater. They‚Äôre tired of their reps campaigning one way at home, then coming to Washington and protecting the status quo. It‚Äôs time to DO what you told your constituents you were going to do when you got here.

The American People shouldn‚Äôt be forced to suffer further under the Biden economy because Congress wants to
run up the credit card again  ‚Äî Americans can't afford their interest rates, credit card payments are through the roof, can't afford gas, electric, food. We need to listen.

We are not interested in shutting down the government.  But we‚Äôre also not interested in a continuing resolution that just continues the harmful policies of the Biden/Schumer/Pelosi era, and we are NOT going to vote for it.
A formal impeachment inquiry into President Biden‚Äôs culture of corruption is long overdue and fully warranted.

Humbled and privilege to start the day as so many of us did on 9/11 ‚Äî in prayer, and with gratitude for our First Responders. May God bless them all, comfort those families and friends of those lost, and may God continue our great Nation.

Let me be clear: We aren‚Äôt interested in a shutdown, brinkmanship, or cutting Social Security, Medicare, or Veterans‚Äô benefits - those are already PAID IN FULL. We‚Äôre interested in reining in the out-of-control spending & wokeism making American lives miserable.
And we‚Äôre discussing continued funding for this administration because?  They are at war with the American way of life! #NoSecurityNoFunding
